content.p: We welcome opportunities to work with schools and local communities to promote Chinese language and culture and to develop understanding and stronger links between Britain and China. We have established contacts with several schools in the East Midlands region over the past years. We are invited to run language taster sessions and cultural workshops regularly at local schools including Middleton Primary School, Rushcliffe School, The Nottingham Bluecoat School and Technology College and Nottingham Chinese School.
